snippet: A report commissioned and financed by the oil industry asserts that portfolios lacking energy-sector stocks have suffered compared with those that have them.
abstract: Report commissioned by Independent Petroleum Association of America finds universities that divest their investments in fossil fuel stocks could imperil value of their endowments.
